loading-dock.desc: Loading dock entrance from the street

open-floor.desc: Open floor area (clear movement, no cover)

cargo-a.desc: Cargo cluster A (general goods — crates provide +1D cover)

cargo-b.desc: Cargo cluster B (mixed cargo — crates provide +1D cover)

imperial-crates.desc: Imperial supply crates (marked, alarmed — Moderate Security 15 to open quietly)

imperial-crates-left.desc: Left side of Imperial crates (flanking position)

imperial-crates-right.desc: Right side of Imperial crates (flanking position)

catwalk-left.desc: Left catwalk (upper level, Climbing 12 — elevated firing position, +2D cover)

catwalk-right.desc: Right catwalk (upper level, Climbing 12 — elevated firing position, +2D cover)

office.desc: Office area (desk with stolen manifest — Moderate Perception to find it)

office-desk.desc: Office desk (datapad with shipping schedules, Imperial codes)

barrels.desc: Fuel barrels (explosive — 5D damage if shot, 3m blast radius)

behind-barrels.desc: Behind fuel barrels (+1D cover, but EXPLOSIVE)

floor.desc: Main warehouse floor — open but cluttered with crate clusters

cargo.desc: Cargo areas — crates provide cover (+1D), can be climbed

imperial.desc: Imperial supplies — alarmed crates, high-value contraband

catwalks.desc: Upper catwalks — elevated positions, excellent cover (+2D), Climbing 12 to reach

office.desc: Office area with stolen manifest and shipping data

hazard.desc: Fuel barrels — good cover but EXPLOSIVE (5D damage if ignited)
